comments.body:
`toolchain` should already do this.

That makes it probably cleaner to drop `build.sh` entirely and just do:

```yaml
build:
  script: ONNX_BINARY_BUILD=1 python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@export ONNX_BINARY_BUILD=1
if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then
    export MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET=10.9
fi
# Recommended by https://github.com/conda/conda-build/issues/1191
